content.text: 6 pork loin chops (3/4 inch thick), trimmed
content.eamr: ( ing-4 "6 pork loin chops (3/4 inch thick), trimmed" )

content.text: 1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of chicken soup, undiluted
content.eamr: ( ing-6 "1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of chicken soup, undiluted" )

content.text: 0) In a shallow bowl, combine flour, salt, mustard and garlic powder; dredge pork chops.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "combine"@22:29 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "flour"@30:35 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "salt"@37:41 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "mustard"@43:50 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "garlic powder"@55:68 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-0-0 "a shallow bowl"@6:20 / TOOL )
	)
	:inform ( ac-0-1 "dredge"@70:76 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-4 "pork chops"@77:87 / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 1) In a skillet, brown the chops on both sides in oil.
content.eamr:
( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "brown"@17:22 / AC
		:ppt ( "the chops"@23:32 / FOOD )
		:mnr ( "both sides"@36:46 / FOOD )
		:loc ( ing-5 "oil"@50:53 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-1-0 "a skillet"@6:15 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 3) Combine soup and water; pour over chops.
4) Cover and cook on low for 6-8 hours or until meat is tender.
content.eamr:
( inst-4 / R
	:inform ( ac-4-0 "Cover and cook"@3:17 / AC
		:heat ( temp-4-0 "low"@21:24 / TEMPERATURE )
		:duration ( dur-4-0 "6-8 hours"@29:38 / DUR )
		:until ( cond-4-0 "until meat is tender"@42:62 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 5) If desired, thicken pan juices and serve with the pork chops.
